languages.text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.
languages.original_text: В фазу отталкивания корабль преодолевает несколько первых клеток, отмеченных желтыми стрелками. Когда корабль перемещается на первую клетку с бледно-желтой стрелкой, фаза отталкивания этого хода завершается. Некоторые способности флагмана, например "Перезагрузка щитов", доступны только в фазу отталкивания.

traits.locale_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. "Restart Shields") can be used only during the push phase.

Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. "Restart Shields") can be used only during the push phase.

Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. "Restart Shields") can be used only during the push phase.

languages.text: La fase de empuje tiene lugar durante las primeras casillas de movimiento de la nave insignia, que se indican con flechas amarillas brillantes. Cada vez que tu nave llegue a la primera casilla con una flecha amarilla apagada, la fase de empuje de este turno habrá acabado. Algunas de las capacidades de tu nave(como {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Reiniciar escudos{/g}) solo pueden usarse en esta fase.
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.

traits.locale_text: La fase de empuje tiene lugar durante las primeras casillas de movimiento de la nave insignia, que se indican con flechas amarillas brillantes. Cada vez que tu nave llegue a la primera casilla con una flecha amarilla apagada, la fase de empuje de este turno habrá acabado. Algunas de las capacidades de tu nave(como «Reiniciar escudos») solo pueden usarse en esta fase.

languages.text: 旗舰移动的前几个各自代表推进阶段，会以亮黄色的箭头表示。当您的战舰移动到第一个带有淡黄色箭头的格子时，本回合的推进阶段就结束了。旗舰的某些特定能力（{g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}如重启护盾{/g}）只能在推进阶段使用。
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.

traits.locale_text: 旗舰移动的前几个各自代表推进阶段，会以亮黄色的箭头表示。当您的战舰移动到第一个带有淡黄色箭头的格子时，本回合的推进阶段就结束了。旗舰的某些特定能力（如重启护盾）只能在推进阶段使用。

languages.text: プッシュフェーズは旗艦が移動する最初の数セル中に発生し、明るい黄色の矢印で表示される。自艦が薄い黄色の矢印のある最初のセルに移動すると、そのターンのプッシュフェーズは終了する。旗艦のアビリティの中には、プッシュフェーズ中にしか使えないものがある（「シールド再起動」など）。
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. "Restart Shields") can be used only during the push phase.

traits.locale_text: プッシュフェーズは旗艦が移動する最初の数セル中に発生し、明るい黄色の矢印で表示される。自艦が薄い黄色の矢印のある最初のセルに移動すると、そのターンのプッシュフェーズは終了する。旗艦のアビリティの中には、プッシュフェーズ中にしか使えないものがある（「シールド再起動」など）。

languages.text: Die Schubphase findet auf den ersten Feldern der Bewegung des Flaggschiffs statt, die mit leuchtend gelben Pfeilen gekennzeichnet sind. Sobald sich dein Schiff auf das erste Feld mit einem hellgelben Pfeil bewegt, ist die Schubphase für diesen Zug vorbei. Einige der Fähigkeiten deines Flaggschiffs (wie {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}"Schilde wieder hochfahren"{/g}) können nur während der Schubphase genutzt werden.
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.

traits.locale_text: Die Schubphase findet auf den ersten Feldern der Bewegung des Flaggschiffs statt, die mit leuchtend gelben Pfeilen gekennzeichnet sind. Sobald sich dein Schiff auf das erste Feld mit einem hellgelben Pfeil bewegt, ist die Schubphase für diese Runde vorbei. Einige der Fähigkeiten deines Flaggschiffs (wie „Schilde wieder hochfahren“) können nur während der Schubphase genutzt werden.

languages.text: La phase de poussée se produit sur les premières cases parcourues par le vaisseau amiral et est représentée par des flèches jaune vif. Lorsque votre vaisseau se déplace vers la première case avec une flèche jaune pâle, cela signifie que la phase de poussée est terminée pour ce tour. Certaines des capacités de votre vaisseau amiral (par exemple, {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Redémarrer les boucliers{/g}) ne peuvent être utilisées que pendant la phase de poussée.
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.

traits.locale_text: La phase de poussée se produit sur les premières cases parcourues par le vaisseau amiral et est représentée par des flèches jaune vif. Certaines des capacités de votre vaisseau amiral (par exemple, Redémarrer les Boucliers) ne peuvent être utilisées que pendant la phase de poussée.

В фазу отталкивания корабль преодолевает несколько первых клеток, отмеченных желтыми стрелками. languages.text: İtiş evresi, sancak gemisinin hareketindeki ilk birkaç hücre ilerleyişte gerçekleşir ve parlak sarı oklarla gösterilir. Gemin soluk sarı oklu ilk hücreye ulaştığında o tur için itiş evresi de sona ermiştir. Sancak geminin bazı kabiliyetleri (örneğin {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Kalkanları Tekrar Başlat{/g}) yalnızca itiş evresinde kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text: Push phase occurs during the first few cells of the flagship's movement, indicated with bright yellow arrows. Whenever your ship moves to the first cell with a pale yellow arrow, push phase is over for this turn. Some of your flagship's abilities (i.e. {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g}) can be used only during the push phase.
